H0.text: A kittel, or kitl, is what, traditionally worn by male Jews. Wedding robe

H1.text: A kittel, or kitl, is what, traditionally worn by male Jews. Funeral attire

H2.text: A kittel, or kitl, is what, traditionally worn by male Jews. Prayer shawl

H3.text: A kittel, or kitl, is what, traditionally worn by male Jews. Shroud
